## Simple Linear Regression Model

**Goal:** predict `body_mass_g` from `bill_depth_mm`

```{r lm_fit_simple}
pen_lm_fit_simple <- lm(body_mass_g ~ bill_depth_mm, data = penguins)
summary(pen_lm_fit_simple)
```

```{r}
broom::glance(pen_lm_fit_simple)
```
